OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

CommonStockSharesAuthorized.label: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
CommonStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

CommonStockSharesIssued.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
CommonStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingAc.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Assets, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingAc.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets recognized in investing activities.

SharesOutstanding.label: Shares, Outstanding
SharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares issued which are neither cancelled nor held in the treasury.

BusinessCombinationBargainPurchaseGainRe.label: Business Combination, Bargain Purchase, Gain Recognized, Amount
BusinessCombinationBargainPurchaseGainRe.description: In a business combination in which the amount of net identifiable assets acquired and liabilities assumed exceeds the aggregate consideration transferred or to be transferred (as defined), this element represents the amount of gain recognized by the entity.

CashAcquiredFromAcquisition.label: Cash Acquired from Acquisition
CashAcquiredFromAcquisition.description: The cash inflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period (for example, cash that was held by the acquired business).

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

EquityMethodInvestmentDifferenceBetweenC.label: Equity Method Investment, Difference Between Carrying Amount and Underlying Equity
EquityMethodInvestmentDifferenceBetweenC.description: Difference between amount at which an investment accounted for under the equity method of accounting is carried (reported) on the balance sheet and amount of underlying equity in net assets the reporting Entity has in the investee.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationMinorityInterestI.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Noncontrolling Interest Income (Loss), Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationMinorityInterestI.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling interest income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilitiesAndO.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities and Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilitiesAndO.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accrued expenses, and obligations classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.description: Number of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.
